# copy()

**Instance Method**

Creates a copy of the object.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func copy() -> Any
```

## Return Value

A copy of the original asset instance.

## Copying an player item

- **copy(with:)**: Creates a copy of the object with the specified zone.

items.description: Creates a copy of the object with the specified zone.
items.name: copy(with:)
